List of Research Paper and DOI ID
reports.query:
MATCH (n: ResearchPapers)

reports.title: List of Research Papers information
reports.query:
MATCH (n: ResearchPapers)
RETURN n.datePublished as date, n.title as title, n.id as ID, n.related as related

reports.title: List of Research Product information
reports.query:
MATCH (n: ResearchProduct)
RETURN n.datePublished as date, n.title as title, n.id as ID, n.related as related
